name: Real Speed Racing Driver
description:
Real Speed Racing Driver extended versions brings all the excitement of racing and thrill to drive in real race environment. Paddle up the Race and show the world your skills. Challenging Opponents are waiting for you its not that easy this time. Unleash the Race with NOS and try to be the best throughout laps.The best you drive the best position you get.
Features:
-Include amazing Sound effects.
- Picture-in-Picture (PIP) 2D overview track map
- 3 different camera views including front facing car view (Inside/Outside & Sky views)
- Beautiful 3D graphics of unique race track & cars
- Challenging AI opponents
- Different styles 3D cars
- Realistic car physics
How to Play:
• Tilt your device left and right to steer
• Keep the car on the road else it will lose speed
• Avoid collisions with other cars
